data.name: The Cycle: Frontier - Fortuna Veteran
data.detailed_description:
Some don't just survive on Fortuna III's deadly surface, they thrive on it. Leave your mark on the planet and show any upstart rivals what they're up against.

A new Prospector with various styles and outfits, a unique Coating for all your guns, and a healthy amount of Aurum to use at your leisure. Time to show Fortuna III what you've got!

Your Aurum balance and Cosmetic items are not affected by seasonal wipes.

  • Veteran Survivor Prospect with variations
  • Expedition Master Suit
  • Thrill Seeker Suit
  • Weathered Veteran Jacket
  • Trapper Boots
  • Weathered Veteran Gloves
  • Expedition Master Jacket
  • Expedition Master Gloves
  • Expedition Master Boots
  • Lost Prospector Jacket
  • Lost Prospector Gloves
  • Weathered Veteran Boots
  • Black & Red Weapon Coating
  • 2500 Aurum

data.supported_languages:
English*, German, French, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Italian, Japanese, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or AMD Radeon R9 270
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional Notes: 2GB VRAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-6600 or AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional Notes: 4GB VRAM
